Name: Witches Brew
About the game: Witches Brew is an adult visual novel game following Selene, the new witch in town. As Selene can you make a home for yourself in Wilder Village, make friends and even have some fun as you try and fulfil various villagers potion needs. Get it right and be rewards, but get it wrong and who knows what effect the potion could have on the villagers, perhaps even some sexy results! The visual novel includes multiple decisions to make which affect the ending and just what can happen at the games conclusion if you can make the place your home.
